home.balanceDesc:
Cryptocurrency just got a major upgrade. Mele is the new gold-backed, delegated proof of stake blockchain. Giving you all the security of solid gold, with all the freedom of cryptocurrency. 
It works as a two coin model. MELC is the coin that has all the action, acting as the platform reward and payment token. While MELG is the safe and steady gold-backed stable coin. 
Together, the new blockchain gold standard is born.

transactions.title: Your transactions history
transactions.noTransactionsOne: When you get started, all your fund transfers will show up here.
transactions.noTransactionsTwo: Connect your Account to get started.
transactions.noTransactionsThree: Simply buy coins, and away you go.

qrCode.title: Scan QR code
qrCode.description: Scan QR code to connect your wallet to your account
qrCode.successDescription: Your wallet is now synced to your account
qrCode.errorDescription: Your wallet couldn't be synced with your account

buyCoins.phaseOneDescription: Place your order below and we’ll send you an email with instructions on how to pay.
buyCoins.phaseTwoDescription: Please use this reference code when you make the payment.
buyCoins.pleasePayTwo: to the bank account below. The token balance will appear in your account once we’ve approved your transaction.
buyCoins.succcessDescription: Thank you for your order. We’re checking your payment now.

send.title: Send coins
send.description: Send coins to your friends and family
send.noCoinsDesc: You don’t have enough coins to make this transaction.
send.errorDescription: This address doesn’t exist on our system. Please check it.
send.noWalletDescription: Buy coins to make a transfer

pin.chooseDescription: You will need this PIN to access your wallet

wallet.createWalletDescription: You will need this 12-word passphrase to restore your wallet.
wallet.responsibility: I understand it is my responsibility to keep my passphrase safe.
wallet.confirmWalletDescription: Enter two words from your passphrase below.

calculator.title: Your balance, explained
calculator.description:
Mele is a two-coin blockchain model. 
MELG is a gold-backed stable coin. 
MELC is a reward and payment token. 
When you buy coins you are buying an allocation of MELC and MELG at a ratio of 2:1.
